name: UX research kit
description:
UX research kit templates is to help UI- UX and product designer map robust product with beautiful documentation process.


UX Research kit is functional as well as aesthetically fit in monochrome design language.


UX Research Kit is part of a Notion template -


Design Hub.


Design hub notion system was designed and developed to help UI-UX and product designers to manage their project workflow more efficiently. It is among one of the unique systems available in market making it all in one workspace for product designers.


Features of design hub:

  • Workspace (All in one workspace to manage project)
  • Document templates (50+ document templates for designers)
  • Product launch strategy (In depth product launch system)
  • Community (50+ UI-UX and product designer communities)
  • Resources (800+ tools and resource collection for designers)
  • Bonus (Freebies and discount)



Follow on Twitter to get updates on Giveaway of Design hub Notion template .


Twitter: @deepak_worklab
